short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A free browser extension that brings sharing good code and creating gists just a click away

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
If you are looking for a fast and easy way to share code snippets for free, then maybe Code Aficionado is just what you're looking for. 

It helps you quickly create gists whenever you stumble upon a good piece of code and share it on your website or social media profiles. You can even get a "picture" of the snippet and share it as an image on Twitter or Instagram. 

And the best part? 

It's totally free...

You just need a GitHub account to create and manage up to 3000+ gists.

As you may already know, other developers can star, follow and comment on the stuff you publish there so you can build a strong community and a following around your passion for coding.

Thanks to Code Aficionado, all this is now way easier because there is no need to switch tabs or disrupt your flow in other ways. Just click the extension icon, paste the snippet and submit it. 

You can start sharing it right away or leave that part for later.   

 
What are the main features?

- Easy Gist Creation -  Click the icon and paste the code snippet you want to share

- Easy Code Sharing - Copy the link or the embedding code of the newly-created gist

- Code Snippet Image - You can get an image of your code and share it on Twitter

- Public & Secrets Gists - Make them public or show them only to people you choose

And that's just the beginning...

I plan to keep adding a lot of new features and updates. Most of them will remain free for everybody, so there is no good reason not to try the extension. 

Sharing good code and creating gists are now just a click away...
